tags: 10 / 10, this show takes you through the life of so many different characters, their problems, fears, mindsets, happy moments, sad moments, and you follow their way until they achive their goal, I connect with every single character on a deep level
anime_title_eng: March Comes In Like A Lion 2nd Season

tags: 2.25 / 10, this show has so many flaws and it's just stupid, everything is bad besides the animation and some sakuga moments. It indeed makes things better than SAO but the negative aspects are overwhelming the positive by far

4.25 / 10, kind of sweet but Shimamura feels rather blant compared to Adachi, the show is just dancing and teasing around and both characters are way to stubborn to confess or realize how they really feel
1.25 / 10, boring as hell, has no plot, horrible ecchi and poor animation, a few scenes were funny tho. Can we just delete this show, please?

3 / 10, the plot is pretty boring and the characters have no depth, I didn't care for any of the characters at all, the world building is awful but very interesting use and variety of weapons, this show needs a spin-off with a new cast and better writing
6.5 / 10, has a likeable and entertaining cast, but most of the characters aren't explored well enough to be actually good, the story strugles a lot because of its repetitiveness, Yona is a cutie tho
7 / 10, this anime shows so well how rotten people are, the use of mind games is kinda scary and the ending song will give me one or two nightmares
4.5 / 10, cool aesthetic and some nice scenes, just a bit too dumb in terms of characters and story, can be fun in moments where the anime doesn't try to smarter than it actually is
6.25 / 10, Angle Beast. Angle Beast?!? ANGLE BEAST?!?!? ARE YOU FUCKING KIDDING ME?, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cOVLP52I1L8
8 / 10, good character writing, heartwarming and also heartbreaking scenes, the ending always gets me

anime_title: Ano Hi Mita Hana no Namae wo Bokutachi wa Mada Shiranai. Movie
anime_title_eng: anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day The Movie

tags: 4.5 / 10, good first half and after you know if Mei exists or not it gets more or less boring and the ending is  disappointing, the deaths were fun tho
5.25 / 10, the protagonist didn't feel like a protagonist because the main focus was more on introducing every of the 20 characters, still fun to watch but could be much better
6.25 / 10, better than the first season in almost every aspect, but I can surely say that this anime is too light-hearted for some of the themes it has
3.5 / 10, has a few strong moments but is too generic, the show has flaws everywhere and most stories just aren't good, the ending feels like a bad filler

7.5 / 10, this show is so much fun, the character writing really makes this show. Art, design and music are all good and the show also provides some clever comedy and the take on the romance genre is quite different than your usual love story
anime_title_eng: O Maidens in Your Savage Season

tags: 1.25 / 10, name a small blond loli vampire girl who likes to be naked, sucks blood from the protagonist to get nutrition and can beat the shit out of you? Everyone who says Yue is officially dead to me...
anime_title_eng: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest

tags: 1.5 / 10, I'm pretty sure Gorou Miyazaki doesn't know what he was trying to say with this, so it's only natural that I don't know what the point of this movie is
6.75 / 10, this show is doing SOO MUCH right, very great concepts and execution is almost flawless but some parts of the story bother me a bit. A few dumb character interactions pull down the score

8.25 / 10, "there are as many stories explaining it as there are people involved in it" this isn't just a random quote, this is a method that Ryohgo Narita uses to write something great and outstanding, I would like to see more of this writing technique

9.25 / 10, this anime is giving you sooo much with so little, some eps are just one location and it's still entertaining. The animation is stunning and the dialogue is by far the best and most creative I've ever witnessed, the directing is fantastic

7.25 / 10, "Don't let your dreams be dreams, just do it!" -Shia LaBeouf, two teenagers following their dream to become mangaka and every little success of them made me smile all over my face, very moving story with great comedy that gave me a good laugh

7.5 / 10, every step further to their dream makes me smile, I can relate to most of the characters and that makes this anime so good and the last scene made me tear up a bit, wonderful ending to the season

7.75 / 10, Reversi is literally Death Note, once again I had to smile every time the characters got closer to their dreams and I really like the pacing of the anime, it just keeps going and going and there aren't longer pauses that slow the pacing down

7.5 / 10, this anime has an interesting feeling to it, at the end of every episode you're left there with emptiness in your heart and a little bit of hope and sorrow at the same time, fantastic use of music and well done characters and their conflicts

8.25 / 10, holy fucking shit this show is giving me something that I won't be able to find anywhere else, perfect? No. But man oh man I can't even express myself properly about how much I like this show
8.25 / 10, for a non-action show the fights probably are the best from the whole season

2 / 10, a whole new level of dumbness, this shows wants too appeal towards older viewers(at least it feels like that) but the villains feel like out of a Pixar movie and this show doesn't manage to flesh out its ideas

2.75 / 10, this show is a whole fucking mess, the writing is a complete train wreck and the great directing can't save this pile of garbage, the soundtrack is surprisingly good tho, ohh and how to do a bad plottwist 101 at the end
5 / 10, fun cast with great first 6-7 eps, lost quality after that but still enjoyable
3.25 / 10, the only noteworthy thing are some of the action sequences
6.5 / 10, Trigger is always delivering

6 / 10, fantastic atmosphere through the whole anime, a lot of people claim that the ending is bad, I think it was alright but could be much better, the story falls short in a lot of aspects, arc1 > arc2
4.25 / 10, ngl I enjoyed the show more than I should but it still fails in many aspects, like characters, story, directing. Some scenes are comically bad because of how edgy the characters are acting
6.75 / 10, had problems with the connection between the viewer and the characters but really beautiful backgrounds and a good bittersweet story, Makoto Shinkai defines the "classical lovestory"

7.25/10, lovely story of two girls and their passion for music from a man who really cares about music in his works and this show seems to express Watanabe's love for it, the writing misses its marks at some points and holds back an unpolished masterpiece

3.75 / 10, plot holes, plot holes and plot holes. Good idea but poor... no horrible execution, from a certain point the anime felt like it was written by a 13 year old who has watched Darker than Black and Steins;Gate but still kinda enjoyable
6.5 / 10, the comedy was pretty good but the drama parts of the story didn't work out for me most of the time

9.75 / 10, This anime has a few moments that I consider to be the best the anime media has to offer, after the show managed to make me cry once, I was balling my eyes out multiple times per ep after that, tears of joy and sadness were shed that day

3.75 / 10, I know it is the first movie out of 5 but couldn't you make it at least interesting at some points? I guess the writing is not too bad and I see a lot of potential but it was boring as hell because 50 min full of nothing

8.5 / 10, again this Cowboy Bebop feeling, prefer the series but still very entertaining and fun to watch, the opening scene is the coolest shit that I've ever seen

tags: 8.75 / 10, I love specials that add something to the main story and aren't just nonsence fanfiction stories, Hei x Yin

tags: 5.75 / 10, definitely has it's flaws and is way worse in comparison to it's prequel, a few new characters are quite nice and fun, the soundtrack is good

anime_title_eng: Darker than Black: Gemini of the Meteor

tags: 1.75 / 10, the art and especially color design are as bad as it can get, besides of that nothing else really works that the anime touches upon, but the show crosses the line of "being so bad it's good" at some points, so the 1/10 score gets avoided
7 / 10, some intense next level shit, keep in mind that Death Billiards was created for "Anime Mirai" an anime-festival 2 years before the series Death Parade started to air!
8.25 / 10, enjoyed it most of the time. Really nerve wracking and intence moments, clear structure and good logical thinking, Light is Kira(spoiler!!!.....not really)
7 / 10, original idea but could be much better, enjoyed the conflicts and the characters making the decisions
6 / 10, Kind of weird and the CG mixed with actual good sakuga throws me a bit off (update after: ep1)

8 / 10, is something new and has moments that are funny as hell, the message of the anime is perfect. I also somehow like the rawness of the anime and the soundtrack is one of the best I've ever heard

3.25 / 10, by far not as good as it could be, characters giving sermons and in the end they don't stand to their own morals, the drama is not bad but not nearly as powerful as it could be, at least the OP is a BANGER

6.75 / 10, it's one of these shows that has its very high highs but than on the other hand a lot of episodes are not interesting enough to be talked about, the inner conflicts of Hyakkimaru are well executed

4.5 / 10, unique, clever and interesting directing style, the CGI models of the characters look surprisingly good and detailed, 
but the show just needs way to long until it gets quite good in terms of characters and story, would like to see more

8 / 10, I love everything that this show has to offer, the art, characters, plot and music are all fantastic, the realism that the show manages to maintain is a huge plus for the overall experience and the anime wouldn't be nearly as good without it
6.25 / 10, season 12 of Dr. Stone be like: "Dr. Stone: Nuclear Wars"

6.75 / 10, there's a lot of positive things about this show, the character designs are beautiful, the comedy is good and all the girls have a nice personality, especially Hibiki, and Machio is also amazing

tags: 8.5 / 10, very interesting relationships and interactions between the characters, is overall really good but in the beginning you have to deal with a cluster dump of characters and some parts are a bit too boring and slow

8.25 / 10, The work that was put into this to create such a beautiful town is remarkable, I want to be there so fucking bad, Yuasa Masaaki has a brain full of ideas that all need to be put into animation
anime_title: Eizouken ni wa Te wo Dasu na!

tags: 6.75 / 10, brutal and bloody as hell, also can touch the deepest part of your heart... I like it.

6 / 10, the story and characters are alright but the action is just pure fun, the animation and fights are mostly really nice to look at, nothing special but hella fun, some shots remind me of Monogatari but the director also worked on Monogatari so...
5.25 / 10, on fire, babyyy
anime_title: Enen no Shouboutai: Ni no Shou

tags: 7.25 / 10, I think that we need a HD-remake of the original Evangelion series because look at this movie, it's beautiful

7.75 / 10, this movie shows the reason why I love Eva, psychological study of the characters combined with an amazing cast and the fight choreography is also really good, not so perfect as the series but still a solid add to the Eva franchise

4.75 / 10, Eva: 3.0 You Can (Not) Redo this piece of nonsense, my score could easily be a 2 if I didn't care to much for this franchise, this movie makes no sense at all and it doen't even try to answer questions, will think about giving it a lower score

3 / 10, ep 22 and Saber of Red are the two things that I genuinely liked about the show, ep 22 is full of amazing sakuga moments thanks to Hakuyu Go and Saber of Red has a fun personality, everything else is meh, bad or ok at best
4.5 / 10, went from bad to less bad to even less bad. The story was ok and the fights were ok too, but nothing too special I guess, SAIBAAA!
7.5 / 10, ufotable nailing the animation once again, I love the Fate series but Fate/Zero was far better than UBW, the writing improved over the original Fate/stay night from 2006
7.5 / 10, this season is better than the first one in some ways but on the other hand it is worse than the first season in some ways, have I mentioned how much I love the series?
anime_title: Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works 2nd Season

tags: 9.25 / 10, well written characters and good dialogue, the animation is stunning and the interactions between the characters are well thought out, how to make a fantastic prequel(as a sequel) to a shitty sequel

9.75 / 10, dense action filled scenes and that ending is just perfect and I have to point out the amazing writing and impressive animation, this show is so god damn smart, MAN! Do I love this anime!!!

9.25 / 10, I. Need. More. 6 eps about growing up, made with sooo much love and passion, the pacing is a bit too fast but I could follow the story most of the time, prob need a rewatch. I love the soundtrack and the animation is so smooth
6 / 10, only the cast (especially Makoto) was good and the animation is beautiful, the story is boring and cringe at the beginning and end

4.25 / 10, I do care for every single character and that's what makes every race exciting, the whole cast is what makes Free! good but this season kind of dropped off imo, very experimental and strange music choices
6.25 / 10, I love the cast, the story improved over the first season, the show is very character driven while it still has a quite strong focus on the sport genre

7 / 10, started pretty good and had a nice rhythm up to ep 20, after that still decent but not as good as before(most of the time), liked the cast and some of the OST's (note: WTF Netflix, why do you have to earrape me from time to time from one side?)

7.25 / 10, powerful and emotional, the music is quite fitting and the perfect choise for a story like this, I also like the animation but the story is nothing too special but the execution is on point
4.75 / 10, very interesting and realistic behavior of the characters in fights and overall, but destroying it all by making every character a pussy or a douchebag
3.5 / 10, nothing new in this season, felt kinda unnecessary
2 / 10, besides two more or less "good" characters(Rory and Lelei) complete bullshit, the anime has no storyline at all, it is just all over the place
anime_title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite, Kaku Tatakaeri

tags: 1.25 / 10, after watching the show and thinking about the things the series has done right, I have to say that the show is failing in every single aspect. Rory and Lelei keep me away from giving the show an even lower score
anime_title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite, Kaku Tatakaeri 2nd Season

tags: 7.25 / 10, this show just feels so genuine, honestly just a fun show even if it fails to hit its marks sometimes

9.5 / 10, WE WERE BORN TO MAKE HISTORY... sry my fault, wrong anime but it fits 100 times better here, great characters, awesome space battles with strategies and political aspects, don't judge the anime by its age, judge it by its narrative
7.25 / 10, fairly slow start but it picks up pretty fast and evolves into a very strong story with touching moments and one hell of a bromance if I've ever seen one
5 / 10, shit but like the fun type of shit, maybe not even shit but just crap

2 / 10, "Hey, m8 I'm such a pussy slayer!"-someone "Nah, if this is your gf than you're more likely a goblin slayer"-some other dude, this is a very skiled director, why do you give him shit source material? Give him something like Girls Last Tour ffs
6.5 / 10, at some points I just couldn't stop laughing and the protagonist is perverted, smart and dumb at the same time but nothing too special overall

7.25 / 10, first ep is pure exposition dump but after that the show jumps from 0 to 100, all characters are great and the comedy created through the interactions between them is top notch, the background art is very boring tho

7.75 / 10, hell yeah, get this story going, the writing has it's ups and downs but when it reaches the ups, than you can expect some nice character interactions and smart plot twists, the comedic timing is near perfection,
8 / 10, so much fun, the characters really make the show for me

7 / 10, Yuyuko Takemiya knows exactly how to write good characters and she also nails story, comedy and drama. This anime is believable and it's important to be believable to pull off a story like this, very underrated anime

6.75 / 10, this show can be sooo hilarious when it really tries to be funny but a lot of the jokes are used way to often or they are executed poorly and if no joke hits you within a few minutes than the show can get quite boring
8.25 / 10, Freddie Mercury ED wtf, after episode 1 my favourite show of the season so far (update after: ep1)

8.75 / 10, amazing arc with symbolism that I still need to decrypt most of, I still don't get the inconvenient use of the insertions where I always need to pause to read them properly, if you manage to read them than you're inhuman

2.5 / 10, partly good directing choices and also some great ideas for the story, but the execution is really bad most of the time and the ideas aren't explored to their fullest, the edge is almost as bad as in Goblin Slayer
5.25 / 10, great first few episodes and it's entertaining to see how the characters deal with their new environment, sadly the show grows stale after the first half and the action feel out of place

5 / 10, I would lie if I say that this anime convinced me to live healthier but I'll certainly feel bad for my body every time I consume something unhealthy, makes you smile quite a bit but gets boring after a few eps

anime_title_eng: The Idaten Deities Know Only Peace

tags: 6.25 / 10, honestly a fun movie but some of the plot-points are a bit weird to say the least, imaginary sequences combined with partly great CG make it worth a watch
4.25 / 10, everything looks so monotone and dark and black, the only two good things about this anime are Alucard and the music
6.75 / 10, nonstop dumb-fun action with lots of blood and gore, Nazi-Vampires fucking up London, Alucard in destruction-mode, fuck the ton of flaws this is badassery

7.25 / 10, good mystery anime with 
original elements and with an interesting protagonist but the story is a bit too rushed and it is very messy, overall too underrated
3.25 / 10, not directly bad but almost nothing happened in this movie

anime_title: Hige wo Soru. Soshite Joshikousei wo Hirou.
anime_title_eng: Higehiro: After Being Rejected, I Shaved and Took in a High School Runaway

tags: 3 / 10, "My softcore porn is constantly being interrupted by some juvenile storyline and my dumb action series is constantly being interrupted by low-quality porn" - Digibro, quotes the guy who kinda enjoyed HotD and Shinmai Maou no Testament
5.5 / 10, I enjoy watching 13 year old half naked boys swim in tight swimming shorts on hot summer days ..... FBI OPEN UP
6.5 / 10, I like the setting, the action scenes are dope as fuck and the ecchi is also quite good but the cast is boring and the characters have no depth, overall just a lot of dumb-fun

9 / 10,the best comedy anime I've seen so far, it's refreshing and every single joke is on point, the comedic timing as well as the great writing lead to some hilarious moments that made me laugh for 1 min straight, unpopular opinion: Hina best girl
6.75 / 10, Awwww :3 this is so cute, it made my heart melt
9 / 10, I've searched so long for this kind of writing in romance anime
5 / 10, you can't expect too much from an anime made by one man in seven months, right? Well it is better than some work created by a whole studio with a decent budget and way more time

6.25 / 10, some of the best drama and character writing that is held back by an unfinshed and lackluster story, everything we get to see is good but no story is even close to being complete, the original creator got robbed

8 / 10, now THAT is a mystery anime, interesting cases and the way the cases get solved is really good because it keeps up the attention of the viewer, the cast fits the theme very well and is overall great, Chitanda x Oreki

7.5 / 10, one of the most interesting takes on mystery I've seen in anime, the characters are wonderfully written and make the show a joy to follow, big kudos to the music composer that made the anime even more enjoyable

anime_title_eng: Don't Toy with Me, Miss Nagatoro

tags: 7.75 / 10, that is by far the most surprisingly good anime I've ever watched, the anime hypes you so much with the amazing soundtrack and Takumi is just a monster and it is fun to watch him
6.25 / 10, Initial D is so much fun in a dumb way
5.25 / 10, N-nani? Kansai drifto?!?

2.5 / 10, boring slice of life with magic in it, almost everything about this show is forgettable, has some strong moments here and there but overall too inconsistent and why is there a group of 7 characters? Thats way too many
4.75 / 10, light hearted and sweet story with an interesting premise, the characters are all likeable and sympathetic, sadly neither the story nor the characters progress after a certain point
6.5 / 10, I had so much fun during the tournament, honestly would love to see more if this is where Jujutsu Kaisen is heading
9.5 / 10, every girl in K-On! is best girl

anime_title_eng: The Tale of the Princess Kaguya

tags: 8 / 10, good rom-com with fantastic character-chemistry, every single character has so much personality and it's fun to watch how the cast interacts with each other, Chika is heavens preciousest angel and Ishigami rounds up the cast really well

tags: 8.25 / 10, Fun, just like the first season
anime_title: Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai?: Tensai-tachi no Renai Zunousen

tags: 7.5 / 10, Takumi is a character I could watch all day. Without him the show wouldn't be nearly as good as it is. The anime is very repetitive when it comes to comedy but in a good way

4 / 10, I see that a lot of thought went into making such a story but the details make the events in the anime too convenient at times, the writing is quite dumb in that regard, a few characters are kind of good but most of them really aren't

4 / 10, the protagonist is unlikeable to the power of 2, everything else is so basic, generic and reeks of bad writing. I still believe there is hope, because the female cast is the only enertaining aspect

5.5 / 10,I understand the hype but the show takes itself way to serious and I didn't resonate with the characters well enough too actually care about their success too much, I appreciate the great writing and especially character writing tho

anime_title_eng: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind

tags: 9.75 / 10, most underrated Miyazaki movie, the themes are conveyed so well and Miyazakis own experience clearly played a big role im terms of the story, there is so much to unpack and talk about, le vent se lève!... il faut tenter de vivre!

9.75 / 10, every second of animation is perfect, the fights are all creative and original and the story is very symbolic and has lots of details that you pick up when you watch the show twice, Mako is the best, the soundtrack is one of my favourites

7.25 / 10, quality production à la ufotable, very likeable cast that can be kind of annoying from time to time, the fights are something I would revisit on YT just to experience the hype all over again and HEE-HEE Maikuru Jakkusun is in here SHAMONE

anime_title_eng: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Mugen Train Arc

tags: 9 / 10, beautiful animation, wonderful soundtrack, original story and good execution. The elements in this movie compliment each other very well, prepare your tissues

9 / 10, this movie is truely beautiful, it has many deep and relevant themes that most anime are way too afraid to touch, like bullying, disabilities and depression. Watching the movie is a great experience and very touching.
NEKO KOMI

3 / 10, this anime is using exposition as its #1 storytelling device to drive the plot forward, do I need to say more?
7.75 / 10, colorful, explosive and fast, love the overall aesthetic of the show, very unique in the concept and presentation, also likeable characters and engaging conflicts

7 / 10, first off, the soundtrack is HYPE, the exploration of MMORPG elements is well done and the tactics in battles are also very MMORPG like(fuck you SAO) but some parts/arcs are boring and at some points the exposition fucks you for 15 min straight

6.25 / 10, the first few episodes were kind of a waste of plot, the characters are good but the story wasn't the best in the first episodes but it all changes midway through and the story starts to pick up, so I can forgive the anime for it's slow start

4.75 / 10, not as polished and imaginative as known from Ghibli, seems like a side project
6.5 / 10, can't keep up with the two last seasons but it's still worth the watch

9.5 / 10, Whoaa! That anime got better and better with every episode, the anime builds up such strong and well written characters and makes the best out of it in the end and the directing definitely stands out of everything I've seen so far. Love it.
3.5 / 10, If you want a bad summery of Evangelion and the first 30min of End of Evangelion than go ahead and watch it (please don't do it)
10 / 10, probably the best sequel Evangelion could get, the directing is brilliant just like in the series, the conclusion is brilliant, all praise to Evangelion, you have my full respect
anime_title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
anime_title_eng: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion

tags: 4.5 / 10, ep 1 was phenomenal, the eps after it were getting worse and worse as the show went on, the music carries the anime and sets the tone of the whole show single handedly. The cult-arc was awful

3.75 / 10, I feel like the anime wanted to focus on the characters and their relationships between each other. The plot has a lot of scenes that could make the character development quite good but it failed completely

4.75 / 10, thank god that the writing style has changed, now there is more diversity in the eps but still far away from being good writing. Directing and animation are brilliant, 2 points are just for these two aspects

8 / 10, the second ark is a bit better than the first one, the soundtrack is amazing and the directing is outstandingly good, symbolism EVERYWHERE, overall it isn't as good Bakemonogatari but definatly doesn't need to hide in the shadow of it
7.5 / 10, I hated the first 2 eps, throughout dumb but still enjoyable and fun... oh and something something Jojo reference

6 / 10, eyecandy and overall amazing animation, doesn't do anything too wild with it's story but has strong moments that are entertaining to watch and it serves as a nice prequel to the series, the series is kinda superior to Zero

4.25 / 10, it's not bad in any regard, it's just undershooting so fucking heavily in terms of story, there is nothing in the plot that is remotely to being interesting besides of the rough setting, I can see this being a solid 7/10 if the plot gets better
7 / 10, my body is ready and so is my mind

5.5 / 10, really good and likeable characters, but had a bad plot and a terrible end fight, as much I like Bones I don't like the first season of Noragami too much, it's still not bad, just not good...
7.5 / 10, Noragami Aragoto has improved over the first season, the story is interesting and the cast is also better even tho the cast was already the strongest point in the first season

8 / 10, there is absolutely nothing that you can compare to this show, it is hilarious and so are the characters in the anime, Saitama is just a rip off character of Shaggy from Skooby Doo, tho Shaggy could beat Saitama with only 5% of his power

4.75 / 10, quite a disappointment in comparison to the first season, the story in this season is as good if not even better than in the first one but the awful animation and fight choreography do not make me feel the thrill the first season did
7 / 10, Bakarina is half the fun of the show, she shines in the pile of forgettable characters, good take on the isekai genre

5.5 / 10, a fun show with a weird cast(in a good way), has some highs in it's drama but a lot of the actions that the characters make are just dumb and make no sense to me, the show also has some nice underlying thought-provoking themes

6 / 10, once you get into the show it's quite fun, weird things are going on and I might not get every single bit of the symbolism, better said I don't try to get every single bit of the symbolism, extraordinary yes but not too much either

1.5 / 10, feels mostly like the bad plot in hentai before it gets serious, when the anime tries to achive something it actually does, the directing has sometimes its peeks and with the music the show creates a quite nice atmosphere here and there

7 / 10, I love the humor the anime has and the dialogue is also really good, I enjoy the type of storytelling and I would like to see more of this show because I think the anime can tell much more stories and the possibilities are endless
